ing: 6 cups confectioners' sugar, or more as needed
des: "A quick fondant. If you want colored fondant, add a dash of food coloring and knead."
ins: Mix butter, sweetened condensed milk, confectioners' sugar, and vanilla extract in a mixing bowl until fondant has the consistency of modeling clay. If fondant is too moist, knead in additional confectioners' sugar. Roll out on a work surface generously dusted with confectioners' sugar to desired thickness.
